body:
Hey guys! Who here likes card tricks? I LOVE CARD TRICKS! Do you have any card tricks to show? There are a bunch of very creative ones. There are classics and even some funny ones! One of my favorites is called:


Jack The Bounty Hunter!
I performed it myself - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pA4zCBTn6fc



Is there any card tricks that you like and would like to share?

replies.body: Nice. It looks legit, but after I viewed the video twice, as an Asian (Korean), I notice things alot easily, and noticed that this is basically logic. :P It is a good trick to play, but I suggest you learn tricks people would think is magic, like making a card turn... BLANK. :) Also, search Collins Key. Awesome magician.

replies.body: Or shrinking a deck like I recently learned :D And the one I'm uploading soon, You pick a card then I make the deck very messy (cards face to back, back to face, and back to back.) Then with just a snap I fix the deck leaving one card facing up which is your card.
